item.title: OpenMedical
item.description: OpenMedical is a website with an emphasis on being an open-source architecture to be used for creating an open environment that can be easily expanded upon. Project has been intended for use in newly founded hospitals wanting a basic infrastructure that can be quickly expanded upon by software engineers. It uses popular, readily available frameworks with plenty of documentation to assist in usability. OpenMedicalâ€™s structure is built utilizing a two-layered architecture utilizing an ASP.
